juding_criteria:
Here is a list of every concrete visual element the final image must contain:

*   White two-drawer desk
*   White metal shelving unit to the left of the desk
*   White metal shelving unit to the right of the desk
*   Dark wood-look floor
*   Light beige wall
*   Partially visible chair in the bottom right
*   White furry throw on the chair
*   Striped cushion on the chair
*   Computer monitor on the desk
*   Succulent pattern displayed on the computer monitor screen
*   Black computer keyboard in front of the monitor
*   White geometric desk lamp to the left of the monitor
*   Monstera plant cutting in a clear glass vase on the desk
*   White latticed desk organizer to the right of the monitor
*   Laptop computer within the desk organizer
*   Books within the desk organizer
*   Three white rectangular magnetic boards on the wall above the desk
*   Various photos, notes, and cutouts attached to the magnetic boards
*   Yellow-rimmed circular wall clock above the magnetic boards
*   Large monstera plant in a light green ribbed pot, on the top shelf of the left shelving unit
*   Clear glass cloche containing a dark vintage-style object with a rope handle, on the top shelf of the left shelving unit (next to the monstera)
*   Desktop globe with a brass-colored stand, on the second shelf from the top of the left shelving unit
*   White roses in a clear glass vase, on the second shelf from the top of the left shelving unit
*   White headphones with red accents, hanging on the frame of the left shelving unit
*   Yellow and white patterned storage box, on the third shelf from the top of the left shelving unit
*   Small white cat figurine in front of the yellow box on the left shelving unit
*   Small framed picture of a black cat, next to the cat figurine on the left shelving unit
*   Elongated white rectangular planter containing a green plant, on the fourth shelf from the top of the left shelving unit
*   Stack of books and magazines on the bottom shelf of the left shelving unit
*   Green leafy plant in a white ceramic pot with a blue pattern, on the top shelf of the right shelving unit
*   Black camera with a black and white polka-dot strap, on the second shelf from the top of the right shelving unit
*   Stack of light-colored gift boxes, on the second shelf from the top of the right shelving unit
*   Small plant (possibly a succulent) inside a glass cloche, on the third shelf from the top of the right shelving unit
*   Yellow and white patterned storage box (partially visible), on the third shelf from the top of the right shelving unit
*   Three small glass jars with cork stoppers, on the third shelf from the top of the right shelving unit
*   Red and gold patterned box (partially visible), on the fourth shelf from the top of the right shelving unit
